lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 38 points and Tony Allen added a career-high 30 to help the host Boston Celtics extend their winning streak to four and move into a first-place tie with the Nets in the Atlantic Division with a 119-114 victory against the Denver Nuggets last night.
